hero_sub_headline: Your cultural investigation toolkit. Track clues, connect with community, and create authentic stories.
vessel_intro_description: Create authentic mystery narratives that celebrate culture and community.

mvp_features.title: Theory Boards
mvp_features.description: Collaborative spaces for organizing clues and building theories with your investigation team.

mvp_features.title: Cultural Code Library
mvp_features.description: Curated collection of cultural references, symbols, and historical context for investigations.

mvp_features.title: Story Studio
mvp_features.description: Tools for creating and sharing mystery narratives with community feedback.

mvp_features.title: Community Hub
mvp_features.description: Connect with fellow investigators and share discoveries in real-time.

roadmap_features.title: AR Investigations
roadmap_features.description: Augmented reality features for location-based mystery solving.

roadmap_features.title: Live Event Integration
roadmap_features.description: Real-time participation in cultural investigation events.

freemium_description: Start investigating for free with essential tools, then upgrade for advanced features.
premium_upgrade_text: Upgrade for unlimited features, advanced tools, and exclusive content.
cta_early_access_title: Get Early Access & Vote on Features
cta_early_access_description: Be among the first to experience Vessel when it launches and help shape its development.
feature_voting_description: Which features would you like to see prioritized?
